alerts.description: Alert to submitter when campaign approved
Alert to submitter when campaign rejected
Alert when campaign has been held
Alert when campaign has been unheld
Alert when new child campaign has been created

fieldUpdates.name: RTL: Update Active flag to false
RTL: Update Active flag to true
RTL: Update Active flag to true

fieldUpdates.description: Update Campaign Record Type = Local Exclusive
fieldUpdates.name: RTL: Update Record Type = Local Exclusiv

fieldUpdates.description: Update Campaign Record Type = Mass Campaign
fieldUpdates.name: RTL: Update Record Type = Mass

fieldUpdates.description: Update Campaign Record Type = Exclusive Campaign
fieldUpdates.name: RTL: Update Record Type = Exclusive

fieldUpdates.description: Update campaign status to FINAL Approved
fieldUpdates.name: RTL: Update Status to FINAL Approved
RTL: Update status to In progress

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Create new campaign
rules.description: Email alert to group of user when new campaign has been created under the approved campaign
rules.formula: AND( Approvedflag__c = true , OR(RecordType.Name <> 'Commercial', RecordType.Name <> ' Master Campaign ',RecordType.Name <> 'Dummy Campaign' ))

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Hold campaign Approval

criteriaItems.value: Exclusive Campaign (Active),Local Exclusive Campaign (Active),Mass Campaign (Active),Research Campaign (Active),Master Campaign (Active)

rules.description: Email alert to group of user when campaign has been held

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Unhold campaign
rules.description: Email alert to group of user when campaign has been released
rules.formula: AND(AND(ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"On hold") ,ISCHANGED( Status )),OR(RecordType.Name = 'Exclusive Campaign (Active)',OR(RecordType.Name = ' Master Campaign (Active)' ,RecordType.Name = 'Mass Campaign (Active)',RecordType.Name = 'Local Exclusive Campaign (Active)')))

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Update record type when campaign %3D cancelled %28Child - Exclusive campaign%29
rules.description: Scheduling set the Exclusive campaign to Expired when campaign cancelled

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Update record type when campaign %3D cancelled %28Child - Local exclusive campaign%29
rules.description: Scheduling set the Local Exclusive campaign to Expired when campaign cancelled

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Update record type when campaign %3D cancelled %28Child - Mass campaign%29
rules.description: Scheduling set the Mass campaign to Expired when campaign cancelled

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Update record type when campaign %3D cancelled %28Child - Research campaign%29
rules.description: Scheduling set the Research campaign to Expired when campaign cancelled

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign - Update record type when campaign %3D cancelled %28Master campaign%29
rules.description: Scheduling set the Master campaign to Expired when campaign cancelled

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Schedule Expire Exclusive
rules.description: Scheduling set the Exclusive campaign to Expired when campaign end

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Schedule Expire Local
rules.description: Scheduling set the Local campaign to Expired when campaign end

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Schedule Expire Mass
rules.description: Scheduling set the Mass campaign to Expired when campaign end

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Schedule Expire Master
rules.description: Scheduling set the Master campaign to Expired when campaign end

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Schedule Expire Research
rules.description: Scheduling set the Research campaign to Expired when campaign end

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Set Stage%2FStatus%2FRecord Type for New Campaign - Exclusive
rules.description: For a new child campaign (Exclusive), set Status = Planned; Stage = New; Record Type = Exclusive Campaign; Active = False

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Set Stage%2FStatus%2FRecord Type for New Campaign - Local Exclusive
rules.description: For a new child campaign (Local Exclusive), set Status = Planned; Stage = New; Record Type = Local Exclusive; Active = False

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Set Stage%2FStatus%2FRecord Type for New Campaign - Mass
rules.description: For a new child campaign (Mass), set Status = Planned; Stage = New; Record Type = Mass; Active = False

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Set Stage%2FStatus%2FRecord Type for New Campaign - Research
rules.description: For a new child campaign (Research), set Status = Planned; Stage = New; Record Type = Research; Active = False

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Exclusive %2F Immediate
rules.description: Immediately update the campaign stage, status in Child campaign (Exclusive) when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Exclusive %2F Schedule
rules.description: Scheduling update the campaign stage, status in Exclusive campaign when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Local %2F Immediate
rules.description: Immediately update the campaign stage, status in Child campaign (Local Exclusive) when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Local %2F Schedule
rules.description: Scheduling update the campaign stage, status in local campaign when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Mass %2F Immediate
rules.description: Immediately update the campaign stage, status in Child campaign (Mass) when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Mass %2F Schedule
rules.description: Scheduling update the campaign stage, status in Mass campaign when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Master %2F Immediate
rules.description: Immediately update the campaign stage, status in Master campaign when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Master %2F Schedule
rules.description: Scheduling update the campaign stage, status in Master campaign when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Research %2F Immediate
rules.description: Immediately update the campaign stage, status in Child campaign (Research) when it has approved

rules.fullName: RTL Campaign%3A Update after approved - Research %2F Schedule
rules.description: Scheduling update the campaign stage, status in Research campaign when it has approved
